          "properties": {
            "title": [
              [
                "This shows how to do strings replacements with regular expressions. "
              ],
              ["(?U)or.*al", [["c"]]],
              [" is a non-greedy ("],
              ["(?U)", [["c"]]],
              [" flag) regular expression that matches "],
              ["original", [["c"]]],
              [" string."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
